page.title: 15A FISHING LOCH IN STRACHAN
page.content:
Major & Mrs Strachan bought Mill of Strachan 20 yrs ago because it is pro- nounced STRONN as in their name and it looked nice and had great poss- ibilities. It took a lot of work to convert it to proper living quarters. Major Strachan has dug out holes with a JCB digger in the field to make the loch.The water comes off the old mill- lade. They were going to run a fish farm but competition is now too keen so he stocks it with rainbow trout and lets out the fishing . We were told that the water is so deep that if Major Strachan were to stand up in it and stretch up his hand he wouldn't be seen.He is tall.He some times goes boating on it.
(a p3. report)
